Are psychosocial interventions (i.e. psychoeducation, cognitive-behavioural therapy, counselling, self-help groups) for carers of persons with schizophrenia/psychosis/ schizophrenia spectrum disorder, bipolar disorder or substance use disorder effective compared with placebo/other controls?
